definition: Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
Gu Kaizhi or Ku K'aichih (346-407), famous painter of Eastern Jin dynasty, one of the Four Great Painters of the Six Dynasties 六朝四大家
variant of 愷悌|恺悌[kai3 ti4]
variant of 愷撒|恺撒, Caesar (emperor) used by Yan Fu 嚴復|严复
Caesar (name)/Gaius Julius Caesar 100-42 BC/by extension, emperor, Kaiser, Tsar
Julius Caesar, 1599 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚

sentences.english: Kaylin Huang graduated from Franklin High School in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 黃愷琳今年畢業於糜鹿林的富蘭克林高中。

sentences.english: Kaylin will be attending University of California, Davis in the fall to study environmental science.
sentences.chinese: 黃愷琳將就讀於戴維斯加州大學攻讀環境科學。

sentences.english: Kevin with us at Vancouver Lake Park, WA on Labor Day weekend.
sentences.chinese: 愷恩和我們大家在華盛頓州溫哥華湖公園更多照片。

sentences.english: Happy Birthday to you ar. Smart Hunter.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，仲有愷仍妹妹都祝你生日快樂。
但是，愷低着頭，默默無語。

sentences.english: Small as he is, he is surrounded by love and well-wishes, in particular from his brother.
sentences.chinese: 但對他的親人，特別是小哥哥愷恩，可是太重要了。

sentences.english: Caesar is stabbed by the senators; Christ is cuffed by lackeys .
sentences.chinese: 愷撤被元老院議員刺死，耶穌捱了奴僕的巴掌。

sentences.english: On the last day of Spring Break, I took Kevin to the city library.
sentences.chinese: 春假的最後一天，我帶孫兒愷恩去市圖書館。

sentences.english: Let us do our endeavor for Hawick.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們爲愷威盡一份微薄之力。

definition: camel/white horse with a black mane (archaic)
piebald horse/used for 麒[qi2], mythical unicorn
